name: Lilienthal Elementary ExCEL Program
description: LOCATION: Claire Lilienthal School Winfield Scott Campus - 3630 Divisadero Street, San Francisco, CA 94118 The Claire Lillienthal Learning Academy (CLLA) was formed in 2000 to accommodate the many working parents with children attending this neighborhood school whose dismissal time is very early. PROGRAM INFORMATION GRADES participating: Entering 3rd-8th grades. - AFTERSCHOOL CARE: Monday - Friday 2:05 pm-6:00 pm 12:35 pm program start time on Wednesdays, due to early school release. REGISTER ON

agency: YMCA of San Francisco - Richmond District
